title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 475.5 - Reissuance of permits, plates and stickers after suspension or revocation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 475.5 - Reissuance of permits, plates and stickers after suspension or revocation

State Regulations
(a) If a permit and
plate or sticker have been suspended, they will be returned to the carrier by
the commission at the termination of the period of suspension. (b) If a permit and plate or sticker have
been revoked, an application for a new permit and plate or sticker may be made
by the carrier after the expiration of six months from the date of the order of
revocation. Such application should be made in the same manner as the original
application. (See ยง
473.1, supra.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
475.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
